thread.title: Biblio

author: Biblio
title: Biblio
text:
I had some "coffee table" type cookbooks in excellent condition I thought someone might want. SellbackyourBook.com was an easy way to do this. I was able to look up each book in the database and see the offered price. Prepaid shipping was a huge plus. My check arrived within a week after receipt of books.
Part I like best is seeing the book and offered buy back price on their website.
